definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Morning Star Farms makes vegetarian buffalo wings, BBQ ribs, and meatless meatballs.
sentences.chinese: 晨星农场提供水牛城素辣鸡翅，烤素肋骨，和素肉圆。

sentences.english: Water buffaloes are stronger, and can swim.
sentences.chinese: 水牛比黄牛好，力气大，还会游泳。

sentences.english: Lions attack a buffalo on the Masai Mara in Kenya
sentences.chinese: 肯尼亚马塞马拉，狮子袭击一只水牛。

sentences.english: Plains Indians were dependent on buffaloes, and refused to over-hunt them.
sentences.chinese: 平原印第安人都依赖于水牛，并拒绝过追捕他们。

sentences.english: Classic Buffalo-style chicken wing sauce is composed of 2 ingredients: a vinegar-based cayenne pepper hot sauce and butter.
sentences.chinese: 经典水牛炸翅的腌制酱料是混合醋和黄油的辣椒沙司。

sentences.english: Water buffalos have tilled our paddies for millennia, yet how much do we really know about them?
sentences.chinese: 水牛为人耕田几千年，人们对它又了解多少呢？

sentences.english: What do you get when you cross a cow with a buffalo?
sentences.chinese: 当你将一只奶牛和一只非洲水牛杂交时你得到了什么？

sentences.english: The processing techniques and key technical points for making buffalo nubuck upholstery were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了水牛磨砂沙发革的加工工艺及技术措施。

sentences.english: Buffalos used to roam freely on the Colorado Plains.
sentences.chinese: 水牛以前常常自由自在地在科罗拉多平原上漫步。

sentences.english: Her initial stages [on the island] were having to learn how to hunt.
sentences.chinese: 马迪头上岛后的最初阶段，是要学习如何狩猎水牛。

sentences.english: Kate finds a second baby giraffe, caught between a buffalo and a penguin.
sentences.chinese: 凯特又找到一个小长颈鹿，在一只水牛和企鹅之间。

sentences.english: I am more frightened of the buffalo than of any other creature in Africa.
sentences.chinese: 在非洲的这些动物中，我最害怕的是非洲水牛。

sentences.english: Others already working hard with their water buffalos.
sentences.chinese: 还有的人已经牵着水牛在辛勤劳动了。
水牛和母牛都不见了踪影。

sentences.english: Tomato, mozzarella , Prawns, squid, mussels, scallops and clams.
sentences.chinese: 番茄，把发落水牛芝士，虾，鱿鱼，蚌类。

sentences.english: Farmers race on buffaloes during a festival in Chonburi province, Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 节日期间，泰国春武里府的农民的骑水牛比赛。

definition: Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
